column1: Amancio (Spanish pronunciation: [aËˆmansjo]) is a municipality and town in the Las Tunas Province of Cuba. It is located in the south-western part of the province
column2: and opens to the Gulf of Guacanayabo to the south.

column3: 523. With a total area of 857 km2 (331 sq mi)
column4: it has a population density of 48.5/km2 (126/sq mi).
